name: Really?
description:
Really? 

I don't know how I came up with the game, but it is about some ghosts that are disguised as workers in a "playground lab" and you have to kill all of them per difficulty. 

The game is just a prototype and I do not know its fate yet, but who knows!?

---------------------------------------------

CONTROLS

  • WASD - Movement
  • MOUSE - View and Shoot
  • SPACE - "Switch Dimensions"
  • 1 & 2 - Switch Weapons (No '3' yet)

HOW-TO-PLAY

Move around the map to strategically kill the worker-disguised ghosts. Hint: press the space bar so you can see them and kill them. Hurry up! Each difficulty has a timer so be quick. Also, do not stay in the ghost dimension for too long, you can be too panicked and then die!

Do you "Really" like the game???

Enjoy!

-A brackeys game jam submission...
